### XII International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems

**Edinburgh (United Kingdom), 7–8 September 2023**

Contact: [iwoloca\@gm.uca.es](mailto:iwoloca@gm.uca.es)

::: panel-tabset
## Welcome

![](images/IWO_XII_poster2023.jpg)

**Welcome,**

The **International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems** was celebrated in **Edinburgh (United Kingdom) on 7 and 8 September 2023**.

This activity was organized by the **Spanish Network on Location and Related Problems** and **GELOCA**, the SEIO working group on Location. These organizations involve Spanish researchers focused on locational analysis and related problems, organized in six thematic nodes and distributed among several Spanish universities.

The topics of interest include location models, networks, transportation, logistics, exact and heuristic solution methods, and computational geometry.

Researchers and practitioners were invited to present works in the form of oral communications or posters. For participation, the submission of a short abstract was required.
